title: 13.5.3 Distributed tracing with X-Ray
body:
# Objective
Implement AWS X-Ray distributed tracing to visualize request flows, identify bottlenecks, and troubleshoot performance issues.

## Requirements
- Integrate X-Ray SDK in application
- Instrument API endpoints
- Trace database queries
- Trace external API calls
- Capture AWS service calls
- Implement custom segments and subsegments
- Configure sampling rules
- Set up X-Ray service map
- Create trace search filters
- Configure X-Ray alarms
- Document tracing patterns

## Acceptance Criteria
- X-Ray SDK integrated in all services
- API requests traced end-to-end
- Service map showing all dependencies
- Database queries visible in traces
- External API calls traced
- Sampling rules configured (balance cost vs visibility)
- Trace search working for debugging
- Performance bottlenecks identified
- X-Ray alarms for high latency

## Dependencies
- Parent: Epic 13 (#131)
- Requires: #165 (Structured logging)
- Related: #166 (Application metrics)

## Estimated Effort
**Story Points:** 8
**Time:** 1.5 weeks
**Complexity:** Medium-High
